metadata.title: CVE-2017-11119 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The chk_mem_access function in cpu/nes6502/nes6502.c in libnosefart.a in Nosefart 2.9-mls allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted nsf file.

notes.note: msalvatore> Nosefart bug is still unresolved https://sourceforge.net/p/nosefart/bugs/6/

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
